code: import*as actions from'./actionTypes';export var addCoin=function addCoin(task){return{type:actions.COIN_ADD,payload:{name:task.title.name,count:task.title.count,priceUsd:task.title.priceUsd,totalpriceUsd:task.title.totalpriceUsd,key:task.title.key}};};export var removeCoin=function removeCoin(id){return{type:actions.COIN_REMOVE,payload:{id:id}};};
